metadata.synopsis: A hostage calls for help and tells you how to release her - by pressing the Release button (exact name subject to change).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go near S_GLO_IronThrone_Group6_Prisoner1_5377cb38-731d-4582-9396-98529856cdbf and the AD will play automatically

0.text: Gods... It hurts so m- WAIT! YOU! PLEASE - THE LEVER!
